Question: Atom Semiconductor Technologies Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Atom Semiconductor Technologies Limited

Product 1

- Digital sensing chips for IoT applications
- Low power consumption
- High-performance signal-chain chips
- Smaller size for integration
- Will be present at CES 2024 to showcase products in HK Tech Pavilions, Eureka Park, Hall G, Venetian Expo, #63400
Summary_cn:
原子半导体技术有限公司

产品1

- 用于物联网应用的数字传感芯片
- 低功耗
- 高性能信号链芯片
- 较小尺寸便于集成
- 将出席CES 2024，展示产品于香港科技展区(Eureka Park，G馆，威尼斯博览会场)，#63400号展位
